attributes.action: raising bus adult age in oxford from 16 to 18
attributes.additional_details: Currently, the Oxford bus age for an adult ticket is 16. My fellow colleagues belive this to be unfair, as people are considered to be adults at the age of 18. We think either the age of an adult ticket should be raised to 18, or travel for kids should become free. If you agree with this, please support our campaign.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
